# NSTextFinderBarContainer

**Protocol**

A protocol that provides a container in which the find bar is displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSTextFinderBarContainer : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

To display the find bar, a container for the find bar must be specified. You specify a find bar container using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFinder/findBarContainer] of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFinder] class.

See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFinder] for more information.

## Find Bar View

- **findBarView**: The view assigned by the text bar as the find bar view for the container.
- **contentView()**: A view hierarchy that contains all the views which display the contents being searched.
- **isFindBarVisible**: Returns whether the container should display its find bar.

## Find Bar Height

- **findBarViewDidChangeHeight()**: Notifies the find bar container that the find bar has changed its height.

## Search and Replace

- **NSTextFinder**: An optional search-and-replace find interface inside a view, usually a scroll view.
- **NSTextFinderClient**: A set of methods implemented by objects that support searching using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFinder] class and the in-window text find bar.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

## Conforming Types

- NSScrollView
